mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GroupBuying (ITEMID, DISCOUNT, LISTPRICE, DEADLINE) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{discount}, #{listPrice}, #{deadLine})
mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEMID, I.UNITCOST, I.TITLE, I.DESCRIPTION, I.VIEWCOUNT, I.SUPPID, I.TAGID, I.QTY, I.USERID, I.PRODUCTID, G.DISCOUNT, G.LISTPRICE, G.DEADLINE FROM GROUPBUYING G, ITEM I WHERE G.ITEMID = I.ITEMID AND I.ITEMID = #{itemId}
SELECT I.ITEMID, I.TITLE, I.QTY, I.UNITCOST, G.DISCOUNT, G.LISTPRICE, G.DEADLINE FROM ITEM I, GROUPBUYING G WHERE G.ITEMID = I.ITEMID
